summary: Added more than fifty animations for the player in a single spell.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Thanks for the endorsements[/color]

[color=red]UPTADE 18/02/14: it took me 24 hs more than expected to make version 3.0, may be because I spent all saturday playing that shi.. of rome 2[/color]

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// WHAT IT DOES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
It is like this mod [url=http:/skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34881]AE Animations[/url] by AlterEgo, but:
-No heavy list of spells, only one spell.
-More than 50 animations, sorted by categories.
-Three music customizable in /Data/Sound/fx/animsnd/song_flute or drum or lute.

For an example of songs check [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/4jikpdb2rphhb7t/APSS-Songs.7z]here[/url]. The maximum wav file without a CTD for me was 16mb.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// REQUIREMENTS
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-SKSE, [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]here[/url].
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url].

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// INSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// UNINSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// EXTRA NOTES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
Some other animation mods that you should try:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13931]Dovahkiin Relaxes Too[/url] by wgstein
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10870]Puppeteer Master[/url] by JohnB

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// CREDITS
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
Thanks to AlterEgo for the chair formlist (However I no longer use it) and wgstein for his great mod.
author: JvM

files.name: APSS
files.changelogHtml:
-Finally quite stable version, no major issues of any kind.
-No more updates unless someone finds a bug or suggest an specific animation or (find a way to add custom animations...)

Source code (for Modders)
-Quite clean.
-No many comments, but sectioned.
-Possible unstoppable sound, if SoundID goes higher than 100k (to fix it, you may need two globals just as NPCID).
-Some creatures are not in creature faction, like horses.
-Missing AI handle (Don't know how to do it in papyrus, no documentation).

files.name: APSS source code
files.changelogHtml:
-Finally quite stable version, no major issues of any kind.
-No more updates unless someone finds a bug or suggest an specific animation or (find a way to add custom animations...)

Source code (for Modders)
-Quite clean.
-No many comments, but sectioned.
-Possible unstoppable sound, if SoundID goes higher than 100k (to fix it, you may need two globals just as NPCID).
-Some creatures are not in creature faction, like horses.
-Missing AI handle (Don't know how to do it in papyrus, no documentation).

files.name: APSS - NMM Installer Full
files.changelogHtml:
-Added NMM full installer, has all versions.
-Added 4 animations (broom, eat soup, lean wall, lean table)
-All animations will loop (even those that stop naturally, however you will see the full cycle)
For Beta versions:
-Less intrusive in skyrim game, no quest, no "added animations".
-Added book in Helgen keep or use console.
-When ever equipped cast one time to initialize the script (you should see "starting...")
-AS subversion requires http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557 , removed book from Helgen Keep, moved to Alternate Start Room.

files.name: APSS - NMM Installer Full FIX
files.changelogHtml:
-Added new song choices in the installer, thanks to LeeSama.
-Fixed drum song options in nmm installer, thanks to LeeSama.

files.name: APSS v3
files.changelogHtml:
-Added full mcm menu.
-Added support for language translation.
-Fixed "ObjectReference_Broken_Pointer_Bug" in slot feature.
-Updating from version 2.xx requires a clean save.

files.name: APSS v3 FIX
files.changelogHtml: -Add missing txt file for mcm ui texts.
